RawLine: TNPC_31076051,二仙酒是難度約為{color=#cc0000}四{/color}的{color=#cc0000}藥酒{/color}，這酒靠現在雜記上的配方是無法釀製的。,二仙酒是难度约为{color=#cc0000}四{/color}的{color=#cc0000}药酒{/color}，这酒靠现在杂记上的配方是无法酿制的。

Items.mt: Elsen wine is a medicinal wine with a difficulty level of about four, which cannot be made by the recipe in the current miscellany.
